text: Jean-Marie Rolland (born September 25, 1950 in Algiers) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Yonne department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:People from Algiers Category:People of French Algeria Category:Pieds-Noirs Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Marie Rolland
